text: With the holidays almost here, we had to know what Christmas is like at the Roja ’ s residence. “ Well, we hang out with the family, it ’ s pretty basic, honestly. Every aunt brings a dish, we all just party, we all just take shots. We listen to music, we do tournaments with video games with my cousins.
